clean_data: Oracle Database Administrator Oracle span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan Oracle Database Administrator Saint Paul MN Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Oracle Database Administrator Deluxe Corporation Shoreview MN November 2017 to Present Install upgrade and patch Oracle Grid Infrastructure and Oracle database enterprise and standard editions Applied both PSU and CPU patches using the Opatch utility patches on all the databases Upgraded databases from 11107 11202 to 11203 and to the new 12c Cloning duplicating databases using scripts as well as RMAN for test and developments instances Install and configured a unidirectional Oracle Goldengate 11g Maintained the data integrity and security using integrity constraints and database triggers Also applied TDE wallet Maintain and develop UNIX shell scripts to manage and monitor the environment Perform and ensure database backups restores and recoveries using RMAN Configure and maintain standby database with Data Guard Involved in Installing Configuring and Administration of Oracle 10g11g RAC on ASM ClonedMigrated databases using RMAN and traditional Data pump exportimport utilities in Oracle 10gR2 Manage database space using ASM and filesystems Perform capacity planning at the instance operating system and storage levels Monitor database performance using Grid Control and SQL scripts Tune all Oracle instance components including SQL and PLSQL Troubleshoot service problems determine the root cause and provide resolutions Implement migrations of Oracle schema objects Provide guidance on good database design and implementation practices to Developers Worked with SQL Server team Assisted in migrating data from Oracle RDBMS to SQL Server Implemented SQL Server Security and object permission like creation of users configuring permissions database authentication modes and assigning roles of users Oracle Database Administrator Target Corporation Brooklyn Park MN August 2014 to October 2017 Responsible for configuring Dataguard physical and standby database setup for high availability and handling synchronization issues between primary and standby Run scripts to check the status of databases such as growing table sizes extent allocation free space used space fragmentation etc Performed space management capacity planning disaster recovery and overall maintenance of the databases Managing databases from planning and testing stages through implementation and support Responsible for performance monitoring database tuning identification and correction of performance bottlenecks Perform database server software installations upgrades and patch management as required Refresh and restore tables and schemas Create reports to monitor database information including statistics on schemas tables indexes and space usage and user activity database access login failures application usage and password changes Work closely with Product Development teams and provide feedback to improve product quality Develop administration automation and monitoring scripts as needed Develop and maintain Standard Operating Proceduresdocumentation Oracle Database Administrator BestBuy Corporate Richfield MN May 2011 to June 2014 Created installed upgraded configured and maintained the Oracle database environment Partitioned tables using suitable methodologies to improve performance and manageability Highspeed movement of data and metadata using Data Pump expdp and impdp Implemented Oracle database advanced security practices such as TDE and Data Masking Administered database user security by managing privileges roles and profiles Monitored and tuned performance of database instances using OEM and SQL Developer Worked with developers on constructing effective PLSQL programs and test packages Performed Pointintime recovery PITR database refreshes as well as database recovery Tuned databases using recommendations from the advisory framework explain plan and SQL tuning advisor Planned and scheduled backuprestore strategies following company SLA and recovery time objectives RTO using RMAN Supported application developers in planning load analysis and backup and recovery of data Maintained uptodate documentation of all Oracle environments Education Certified Associate Indian Hills Community College Ottumwa IA June 2011 Skills Database Oracle Oracle 10g Replication Sql Disaster recovery Encryption Rman Aix Linux Red hat Solaris Sun Ux Rdbms Hpux Documenting Oem Optimization Loader
